version.releaseNotes: - Breaking Change: Removed Unity(The DI Framework) Dependency in all the platforms we support. - Breaking Change: Removed ServcieLocator class, TypedServiceLocator class, ViewMapping classes. - Breaking Change: All Dependency Injection now depend on "Microsoft.Extensions.DelenedencyInjection" packages and dlls. Enjoy modern DI. - Breaking Change: Supports Blazor netcore 3.1 now. Please try with new vs template. - Enhanced Validation. See examples in github. - This package only works with VS 2019 Template 2.1.0 +.

- Breaking Change: Removed MVVMWindows,MVVMPage,MVVMControl. Move on to Disguise. - Breaking Change: Moved Common lib to .Net Standard 2.0 Class. - Renamed Events in DisposeGroup: DisposingEntry -> DisposeEntryDisposing, DisposedEntry -> DisposeEntryDisposed - This package only works with VS 2017/2019 Template 2.1.0 +.

- Changed Behavior: IStage.Show<TViewModel>() now accept new parameter: (autoDisposeWhenUnload: true/false) to indicate viewmodel will be disposed when View is unloaded. default value is true - Changed Behavior: WaitForClose will bound to View's Unload but not VM's Dispose
- Changed Behavior: IStage.Show<TViewModel>() now accept new parameter: (isWaitingForDispose: true/false) to indicate caller is waiting for viewmodel's dispose. default value is false
- Fixed BinableBase Class Value will not take effect in the thread instantly (Also Imported by PropertyChanging async cancellation check)
- Fixed DefaultValueFactory Failed to execute bug. (Also Imported by PropertyChanging async cancellation check)
- Fixed Command failed to enable bug (Imported by PropertyChanging async cancellation check).

- Fixed x86 Dll Missing - Changed more features and code snippets. - Added PropertyChanging support. You can also cancel a change. - Added Command Executing support. you can cancel a command before anything been done.
